message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Arrays' import. Should be before 'org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull'.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
Each variable declaration must be in its own statement.

WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
